comment_0: Bringing Back the Sunshine is the upcoming ninth studio album by American country music singer Blake Shelton. The album is scheduled to be released on September 30, 2014, by Warner Bros. Nashville.[1][2] The album will be produced by Shelton's longtime producer Scott Hendricks.[3] "Neon Light," the album's lead-off single, was released on August 18, 2014.
